name: Navitel 5 Map
summary: Learn about .NM3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Navitel is primarily used in Eastern Europe and Russia. Some features include 3D graphics and real-time traffic updates.

description: An NM3 file is a map used by versions 5 and above of Navitel navigation software. It contains map data such as roads, landmarks, GPS coordinates, and natural geography. The NM3 format replaced the .NM2 format used by previous versions of Navitel Navigator.
